component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands: Display the status of CDP on R1.

command.instruction:
Enter Global Configuration mode to configure the following:
  • Enable CDP globally on R1.
  • Disable CDP on interface S0/0/0.
  • Use end command to exit Global Configuration mode.
<font face="_sans"><b>Display the list of CDP neighbors on R1.</font>

command.deviceresponse:
Capability Codes: R - Router, T - Trans Bridge, B - Source Route Bridge
S - Switch, H - Host, I - IGMP, r - Repeater, P - Phone,
D - Remote, C - CVTA, M - Two-port Mac Relay

Device ID Local Intrfce Holdtme Capability Platform Port ID
S1 Gig 0/1 122 S I WS-C2960- Fas 0/5
